events.message: I was involved in a car accident on April 30th; my vehicle sustained significant damage and I need to start the claim process.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the mention of vehicle collision and damage reported by the claimant.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to guide the customer through the auto accident claim process.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate you providing all initial details promptly.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including photos of the damage and official police report for review.
Our claims team has begun investigating the details of the collision and assessing the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident circumstances and verified damage estimate provided.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover repair costs and other related expenses for your vehicle damages.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling so far.
Your auto accident claim was approved based on the investigation and submitted documentation.
The payment for your approved claim has been processed and should reflect in your account within 3 business days.
The claim has been successfully closed after settlement payment and positive feedback from the customer.
The claim documents and case files have been archived in accordance with company policy for future reference.
